001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.decorators;
002
003import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.SuppressFBWarnings;
004import lombok.Getter;
005import lombok.experimental.Delegate;
006import org.openqa.selenium.WebElement;
007
008/**
009 * A base decorator class for {@link WebElement} that provides a wrapper for additional functionality.
010 *
011 * <p>This abstract class delegates all method calls to the original {@link WebElement}, allowing
012 * extensions to enhance WebElement interactions without modifying the core Selenium API.
013 *
014 * <p>Subclasses can override specific methods to add custom behavior, such as logging, exception handling,
015 * or custom waiting mechanisms.
016 *
017 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
018 */
019@SuppressFBWarnings(value = "CT_CONSTRUCTOR_THROW", justification = "Constructor validates inputs properly "
020      + "and throwing exceptions is acceptable.")
021@Getter
022public abstract class WebElementDecorator implements WebElement {
023
024   /**
025    * The original {@link WebElement} instance wrapped by this decorator.
026    */
027   @Delegate
028   protected final WebElement original;
029
030   /**
031    * Constructs a new {@code WebElementDecorator} wrapping the specified WebElement.
032    *
033    * @param original The original WebElement to be wrapped.
034    */
035   protected WebElementDecorator(WebElement original) {
036      if (original == null) {
037         throw new IllegalArgumentException("original WebElement must not be null");
038      }
039      this.original = original;
040   }
041
042}
